jdg.clustering

Class LouvainAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LouvainAlgorithm
extends CommunityDetection
    This class provides an implementatino of the Louvain algorithm for Community detection
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • computeClusters

        public int[] computeClusters(AdjacencyListGraph graph)
        This method returns a partition of a network of size 'n' into communities, computed by the Louvain algorithm

        Remarks:

        -) the nodes of the networks are numbered 0..n-1 -) the graph is partitioned into 'k' communities, which have numbers 0..k-1

        Specified by:
        computeClusters in class CommunityDetection
        Parameters:
        graph - the input network (adjacency list representation)
        Returns:
        an array of size 'n' storing, for each vertex, the index of its community (a value between 0..,k-1)
